issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

resolution.description: All attempts at reproducing this issue failed, or not enough information was available to reproduce the issue. Reading the code produces no clues as to why this behavior would occur. If more information appears later, please reopen the issue.
resolution.name: Cannot Reproduce

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are closed can be reopened.
status.name: Closed

fields.description:
h3. Steps to Reproduce
Tried thru Help, Titanium Update and It started downloading. Tried two times, same result.



h3. Actual Result
Error encountered during update
Failed to install titanium. Please see the Studio log for more information.
Failed to install alloy. Please see the Studio log for more information.
Failed to install acs. Please see the Studio log for more information.

h3. Expected Result
It should install all latest SDK, alloy, Studio etc
fields.summary: Unable to Update Titanium SDK to 3.3.0

comments.body:
Looking at the log file, do you have possible network/proxy issues?

{code}

!ENTRY com.aptana.js.core 4 0 2014-07-18 12:15:35.880
!MESSAGE (Build 3.2.3.201404181442) [ERROR]  Failed to install titanium.

npm http GET https://registry.npmjs.org/titanium
npm http GET https://registry.npmjs.org/titanium
npm http GET https://registry.npmjs.org/titanium
npm ERR! network getaddrinfo ENOTFOUND
npm ERR! network This is most likely not a problem with npm itself
npm ERR! network and is related to network connectivity.
npm ERR! network In most cases you are behind a proxy or have bad network settings.
npm ERR! network 
npm ERR! network If you are behind a proxy, please make sure that the
npm ERR! network 'proxy' config is set properly.  See: 'npm help config'
{code}

Hello! 

If you fix your proxy setup, does it work?

Best Regards!
Can't reproduce, and the customer is not replying anymore.
